input.sentences: you know the type . the kind of guy at every bar who is always surrounded by women and you have /no idea how/ .

output.sentences: Sara met up with John and Jen.
They got drinks at their favorite bar.
Their friend Katie showed up late.
The four friends hadn't seen each other in months.
So Jen couldn't resist giving John a kiss on the cheek.
